items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available and verified.
Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.
Directorship details are available but verification is incomplete.
Tax documentation is available but requires additional information and verification.
Regulatory compliance is partially compliant; some reviews are pending.
Verified business scope details are available, highlighting leadership roles and services.
PEP screening data is available, detailing politically exposed individuals and their risk ratings.
Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.
Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.
